Zero place his arm on Trinitys shoulders and rubbed up and down one 
of her arms gently.

Zero: "No it is not your fault... It is just how things are..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> "IT'S MY FAULT!!!!" shouted crying Trinity "ALWAYS MY FRIENDS GET 
> HURTED OR DIE... THEY ALWAYS... IT'S MY FAULT!!!!"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Trinity::
> > > 
> > > Trinity continue crying aloud and she shouted "ALL IT'S MY 
> > FAULT!!!!"
> > 
> > Zero looks to Trinity, his optics glowing a bright green that 
seems 
> > to dim at the upset Chivtron. he kneels down beside her and makes 
> one 
> > of his wings encircle her in an attempt to comfort her.
> > 
> > Zero: "No little one... it is not your fault..."
